title: Michael Akadiri • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #207
itunes:title: Michael Akadiri • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #207
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with comic, podcaster and doctor MICHAEL AKADIRI!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with comic, podcaster and doctor MICHAEL AKADIRI!


A wonderful chat with Michael as he and Brett get proper into comedy and life and death. It turns out Michael is a perfectly equipped guest to handle such matters, being that he's been at the front line of all things medical, dividing his time between being a doctor and a comic. A fascinating chat which is always fun and funny, while dabbling in the dark side here and there (I would warn for potential triggers but if you're listening to Films To Be Buried With then all triggers are somewhat assumed). A breezy and fun time - catch up with Michael on his Edinburgh Fringe run in August! Enjoy!
